name: Turbo Boat Fight 3000
description:
Made for Global Game Jam 2017.

A high energy 80s inspired single screen multiplayer game!

You and one cool friend play as rad turbo boats duelling around death spikes. Push the other player into death spikes using only the force of the waves your turbo boat makes.

W / Up Arrow = accelerate

A / left Arrow = left

D / Right arrow = right

The faster you sail the more powerful your wake will be, but the harder it is to turn.
